program.name: qalculate
program.script-header:
_datadir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share" _docdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/doc"
_gccsubdir="gcc44"
case "${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+set}" in set) _libglib=${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/${_gccsubdir} _libcln=${SB_VAR_LIBCLN_LIB}/${_gccsubdir} ;; esac
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=powerpc" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=powerpc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=ev5" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=ev5" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
export ac_cv_lib_pthread_pthread_create=no ;; i?86*-solaris*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CXXFLAGS="-pthread -O2 -mcpu=ultrasparc -mvis" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
